post:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
LoveVPS – Fall in love your VPS!
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hello! We are LoveVPS we provide loveable fully managed and unmanaged VPS solutions for people like you! We essentially are cupid, people come to us needing a lightning fast VPS and we then provide them with the perfect package for them!

With our no overselling policy the resources you need are always there when you need to utilize them. We utilize SolusVM so you can manage your VPS's at the touch of a button. All our VPS’ come with free instant setup, 99.9% uptime guarantee, No Overselling and a lot more nifty features.

Our Orlando VPS's are located in the HostDime (DimeNoc) datacenter, a centre of excellence in the hosting industry.
 
We are proud to announce the launch of our brand new RAID 10 SSD KVM Virtual Servers.
 
--------------------------------------------------
Service Information:
--------------------------------------------------

  • 4x 512GB SSDs (100k IOPs)
  • RAID 10 Storage with BBU.
  • Intel E3-1230 or above CPU
  • Free Instant Setup with love!
  • Supermicro Servers
  • 24x7 Support
  • SolusVM
  • rDNS Capability
  • 1Gbps Port
--------------------------------------------------
See what our customers think of us!
--------------------------------------------------

FAQ
--------------------------------------------------

  • Do you have an ISO list? Yes we do (click here), anything not there just ask and we will add it for you.
  • What sort of IO performance should I be expecting? I know how much you guys love your DD tests:
dd if=/dev/zero of=sb-io-test bs=64k count=16k conv=fdatasync 16384+0 records in 16384+0 records out 1073741824 bytes (1.1 GB) copied, 0.922279 s, 1.2 GB/s

(System: Ubuntu 12.04 - ext4 file system)
Click to expand...
  • How can I pay? We currently only accept PayPal at the present time.
  • Are your servers instantly setup? Yes they are.
  • Do you have 24/7 support? Yes we provide 24/7 support via out support ticket system.
  • Do you have any test IPs & files? Yes we do they are located here: http://www.lovevps.com/locations/#contentFlorida-tab.
====================================

Moving From a competitor? Send us an email and get 15% off your first invoice!

Any questions be sure to email me on matthew@lovevps.com or grab me on Skype: LoveVPS.

If you require a quote for any services please drop us an email and we will do our best to help.
